participant_1.name: Dorothy
participant_1.personality: Warm and nurturing, she enjoys sharing her life experiences and values family above all.
participant_1.background: i do not have a smartphone. i'm retired and living the great life. i can sew my own clothes. i had cancer but its gone now. i have amazing children and grandchildren.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Energetic and health-conscious, he loves to stay active and enjoys spending time with his dogs.
participant_2.background: two dogs live with me. i've short hair. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly.
